name: Tony Tony .Chopper
text: Your Turn / On Play // When Attacking: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, and from among them play up to one (Animal) type character with a power of 4000 or less as rested. Then, place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
